response.overview: On an unusually rainy night, a man and a woman meet unexpectedly in an empty café. They don’t know it yet, but this encounter will force them to make a decision that could alter how their story ends — or begins.
response.tagline: On an unusually rainy night, a man and a woman meet unexpectedly in an empty café. They don’t know it yet, but this encounter will force them to make a decision that could alter how their story ends — or begins.
response.title: Two hundred millimeters per hour
